net.rem.em

Interface EM

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.hudup.core.alg.Alg, net.hudup.core.alg.AlgRemoteTask, EMRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.ExecutableAlg, net.hudup.core.alg.ExecutableAlgRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.data.Exportable, net.hudup.core.logistic.Inspectable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    REM
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMixtureREM, DefaultMixtureREM, DefaultMixtureREM.REMExt, EMAbstract, EMRemoteWrapper, ExponentialEM, GEM, NewtonGEM, REMAbstract, REMImpl, REMPrior, SemiMixtureREM, Soco

    public interface EM
extends EMRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.ExecutableAlg
    EM is the most abstract interface for expectation maximization (EM) algorithm. Its main method is learning method used to learn parameters.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double EM_DEFAULT_EPSILON
      Default epsilon for terminated condition, which is the bias between current parameter and estimated parameter.
      static int EM_MAX_ITERATION
      Maximum number of iterations.

      • getCurrentIteration

        Getting current iteration.
        Returns:
